article_title: Small Dog Called Hero After Scaring Off 3 Bears At Home In Monrovia
article_text:
Monrovia, CA

Full Story from CBS Los Angeles

A little dog is being called a big hero after she scared off three bears outside her home in Monrovia.

Ferriter reports that Jules - a 20-pound French bulldog - is a true guard dog.



"She wasn't having it, you're not coming in to her property," said homeowner David Hernandez.



On Friday afternoon, two bears - believed to be about a year old each - wandered into the family's front yard. A third bear was on the balcony, just out of range of the camera. Jules didn't care how many bears there were or how big they were. She chased them off.



"She blew me away, couldn't believe that she turned into a Wolverine," Hernandez jokes.

For her heroics, Jules was given a bath, a treat and lots of kisses.
